General_Description: '''The Call of Democracy''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens]] needs to win [[Peloponnesian War|this war]] in the name of [[democracy]]. Destroy [[Sparta|their]] ranks."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and slew a number of Spartan [[soldier]]s and [[Nation Leader|leaders]], as well as helped Athens win conquest battles throughout [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
